code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[data,setData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("https://query1.finance.yahoo.com/v8/finance/chart/BTC-USD?range=30d&interval=1d");const prices=response.data.chart.result[0].indicators.quote[0].close;setData(prices);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data:",error);}};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Crypto Historical Data"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:data.map((price,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Day ",index+1,": $",price.toFixed(2)]},index))})]});}export default App;
